item.description:
Hi, I sit on Rochester's Energy and Sustainability committee board and In would like to invite everyone who might be interested in listening and talking about energy and sustainability practices, we meet in the city council chambers the first Wednesday of the month at 5 pm, we are there for about one or two hours.

If you would like to meet the Mayor and implement new suggestions your more than welcome to!

If anyone has any questions don't hesitate to contact me at: 603-509-2907.

See you there!

Peter
item.name: Rochester's Energy and Sustainability Committee. Meet the Mayor!
